snippet: James Davis, former chief financial officer of the Stanford Financial Group, testified against R. Allen Stanford, the Texas financier accused of defrauding investors in a $7 billion Ponzi scheme.
abstract: James Davis, former chief financial officer of the Stanford Financial Group, testifies against R. Allen Stanford, the Texas financier accused of defrauding investors in a $7 billion Ponzi scheme; says he repeatedly warned Stanford for years that his Ponzi scheme would collapse.
lead_paragraph: James Davis, former chief financial officer of the Stanford Financial Group, testified against R. Allen Stanford, the Texas financier accused of defrauding investors in a $7 billion Ponzi scheme.

headline.seo: Ex-Partner Says Stanford Was ‘Dictatorial’ in Fraud Case
headline.main: Witness Says He Warned Stanford on Ponzi Plan
